meanings.definition: A group of birds native to Australasia known for their loud calls and striking plumage.
meanings.sent1: The manucodes in the zoo have colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful manucodes flying in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The manucodes had a singing competition in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a group of manucodes.
meanings.sent5: The manucodes chirped like a choir of tiny angels.

meanings.definition: The act of imitating the vocalizations of manucodes.
meanings.sent1: He practiced his manucodes mimicry in the park.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled at his funny manucodes sounds.
meanings.sent3: She won the talent show with her manucodes impersonation.
meanings.sent4: His manucodes imitation was so realistic, it fooled the birds.
meanings.sent5: The manucodes mimicry echoed through the valley.
